name: InteractWithNPC
description: Interact with an NPC (Non-Player Character) in the simulation world.
usage: Use this action when you want to engage with an NPC in a general way.

parameters.name: npc_name
parameters.description: The name of the NPC to interact with

requirements: NPC must be nearby and interactable
NPC must be included in the available interactable entities
whenToUse: Want to engage with NPCs in general
Need to interact with service providers
Want to engage with characters in the world
Need to interact with NPCs for various purposes
